briefdescription.para: Compute the target address for an MSI posted write.

detaileddescription.para: This function is exported by the arch, board or SoC code.

parameterdescription.para: The IRQ we wish to trigger via MSI.
The vector for which you want the address (or NULL)
the size of the vector array

simplesect.para: A (32-bit) value for the MSI MAP register.

briefdescription.para: Compute the data for an MSI posted write.

detaileddescription.para: This function is exported by the arch, board or SoC code.

parameterdescription.para: The IRQ we wish to trigger via MSI.
The vector for which you want the data (or NULL)

simplesect.para: A (16-bit) value for MSI MDR register.

memberdef.argsstring: (pcie_bdf_t bdf, msi_vector_t *vectors, uint8_t n_vector, unsigned int irq)
memberdef.name: pcie_msi_enable

briefdescription.para: Configure the given PCI endpoint to generate MSIs.

parameterdescription.para: the size of the vector array
The IRQ we wish to trigger via MSI.

simplesect.para: true if the endpoint supports MSI, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if the given PCI endpoint supports MSI/MSI-X.

simplesect.para: true if the endpoint support MSI/MSI-X
